actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Davis-Bacon Act to prohibit contractors from replacing certain employees participating in a strike, and for other purpose.

summary.text: Requires that every public contract under the Davis-Bacon Act shall contain a provision that the contractor must notify the contracting agency when ever a strike occurs involving employees who are engaged in carrying out such contract. Directs the head of the agency involved to terminate any contract if he determines that the contractor has replaced, or attempted to replace, any employee participating in such a strike.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Davis-Bacon Act to prohibit contractors from replacing certain employees participating in a strike, and for other purpose.
